item.title: Spring
item.description: There was a gap in a leafy hedge and I watched as a little bird flew in. Spring rises like a green mist, up from the ground. Water is liquid, and comes back from where it was like spring does. Always something coming back from something the beat of a stone, two thumpsâ€” the old heart again.
